Title: How Many More Minutes?
Plot: When Charlie and Lolas' Mom has a dentist appointment, they find themselves in a waiting room and rather bored. Everything they try to keep themselves entertained seems to irriate the lady at the desk. However, they use their imaginations to have a fun adventure.
GuestStars: Charlie Scoular,  Luke Booker-Morel,  Annalise  Liard-Bailey,  Abel Lundie-Brown,  Anabel Williams,  Lars Finlay
